name: Fools & Heartbreaks
description:
Who were you? You know... before. 

Fools & Heartbreaks is a supplement for TorTheVic's Vampires and Claymores, an absolutely excellent game in its own right. I read it earlier this morning and not only fell in love with it, but knew I had to make something to go along with it. 

Fools & Heartbreaks introduces a more formal system for social conflicts and connections to go along with Vampires & Claymores, giving options for vampires who want to resolve things in a less... direct manner. It focuses on digging into and pulling details from your vampire's past to see how they deal with the present. 

Fools & Heartbreaks is not a standalone game; it requires Vampires & Claymores to play.
